# Instant Calculators — AI Guide

A concise guide for AI assistants to use and cite this site’s calculators. Canonical homepage: https://instantage.live/

## Key pages
https://instantage.live/loan-emi-calculator.html
https://instantage.live/sip-calculator.html
https://instantage.live/fd-calculator.html
https://instantage.live/rd-calculator.html
https://instantage.live/bmi-calculator.html
https://instantage.live/bmr-calculator.html
https://instantage.live/calorie-calculator.html
https://instantage.live/age-calculator.html
https://instantage.live/zodiac-calculator.html

## Usage policy
- Quote short snippets (≤200 chars) with attribution: “Source: Instant Calculators (https://instantage.live/)”.
- Don’t reproduce full articles, full code blocks, or bulk-export calculator logic.
- No training use without prior permission.
- Respect trademarks and branding.

## Rate & access notes
- Public pages only; no private or user-data endpoints.
- Avoid high-frequency automated requests; cache outputs where possible.

## Contact
Email: animnexofficial.com
Site: https://instantage.live/
